31. Return-to-work process: The system includes a return-to-work process that allows employees to inform their managers and HR when they are returning from leave, and ensures a smooth transition back to work.
32. Leave cancellation: The system allows employees to cancel their leave requests if their plans change.
33. Leave balance notifications: The system sends notifications to employees when their leave balance is low, allowing them to plan accordingly.
34. Leave-related documents: The system allows employees to upload and store leave-related documents, such as doctor's notes or flight itineraries, for easy access and reference.
35. Leave forecasting: The system allows managers and HR to forecast leave usage and plan accordingly.
36. Leave request history: The system keeps a history of all leave requests, approvals, and denials, providing transparency and accountability.
37. Leave request status tracking: The system tracks the status of leave requests, from submission to approval or denial.
38. Leave tracking by department: The system allows managers and HR to view leave usage by department, location, and employee, providing insight into how leave is affecting different areas of the company.
39. Leave tracking by employee: The system allows managers and HR to view leave usage by employee, providing insight into which employees are taking the most leave.
40. Leave tracking by role: The system allows managers and HR to view leave usage by role, providing insight into how leave affects different job functions within the company.
